name: The Dark Castle (Briana Olson)
description:
Explore the dark forest and avoid enemies along the way. Find your way into the castle and find the truth behind the dark magic within it's walls.

Credits: Made by Briana Olson, Game Design 2 at Butler Community College taught by Zachary Sewell.

Assets: Music from freesound.org, Obelisk by JUHWAN, Stylized Bear by BLINK, Lowpoly environment by Polytype studio

Artstation page:
